channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Renovate Your Home for a Billion Children
item.description: I kept seeing more and more utterly absurd, hugely viral home remodeling videos on TikTok. So I tracked down where they actually come from.

item.title: How a 15-Year-Old Gamer Became the Patron Saint of the Internet
item.description: In 2025, Carlo Acutis will officially become the first millennial saint. But will he help the Catholic Church reach a younger audience?

item.title: Fidelity has cut its estimate of X’s value by 79% since Musk’s purchase
